name: Skyler
color: Grey with a bright red tail
description: Intelligent and talkative, known for mimicking sounds and words.
specialNeeds: Requires mental stimulation and social interaction.

name: Sunshine
description: Cheerful and active, enjoys singing and whistling.

name: Jasper
description: Bold and charismatic, thrives on interaction and play.
specialNeeds: Needs a spacious environment to fly

name: Kiwi
description: Social and friendly, prefers company, ideally suited with other budgies.

name: Ruby
description: Dignified and intelligent, capable of learning numerous tricks.
specialNeeds: Requires a diet specific to macaws, enriched with nuts and fruits.

name: Echo
description: Affectionate and cuddly, often forming strong bonds with owners.
specialNeeds: Needs constant social interaction to prevent loneliness.
